name: Crazy Otto
description: In 2016's CRAZY OTTO you and up to seven of your friends have a job to do: Run the maze, eat the dots, grab the cake, dodge the dinosaurs.Unless you are the dinosaurs, in which case you'd better eat CRAZY OTTO and his friends!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.6GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 180 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 180 MB available space
